thread.title: Stacey O'connor
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Stacey O'connor

author: Stacey O'connor
title: Stacey O'connor
text: I recently had to do a last minute over the phone purchase for my daughters birthday room makeover. The sales team at the Brighton store were so helpful and made sure it all went smoothly and delivered everything in 2 days and made an 11 year old very happy on her birthday. Thank you for your professionalism and customer service.
